hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Abdullah (may Allah be pleased with him) that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) commanded that snakes be killed and he said:"Whoever fears their vengeance is not one of us

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ خَانَ غَازِيًا فِي أَهْلِهِ .
chapter.eng-name: The One Who Betrays A Warrior With His Wife
